document_data.name: The Riders of the Sword
document_data.mainbody: '''The Riders of the Sword''' were a mercenary company based at [[Holdensword|The Hold of the Sword]] in [[Turmish]] early in that nation's history.{{Cite polyhedron/104/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: Country Treasures|8}}
document_data.History:
The Riders of the Sword saw a lot of action in the earliest days of [[human]] settlement on the northern shore of the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]]. A hamlet, Holdensword, sprung up around their stronghold.

By [[1370 DR]], however, the Riders were long gone and the place was but a humble farming community.
document_data.Members: A high-ranking member of The Riders of the Sword was the [[wizard]] [[Olonther]]. He had his quarters and workplace in a series of secret rooms somewhere within either the castle or the tunnels, and built dozens of [[battle horror]]s to defend the stronghold.
